section_title: ISSUES RELATING TO HYDROFLUOROCARBONS AND PERFLUOROCARBONS
sentences: On the relationship between efforts to protect the stratospheric ozone layer and to safeguard the global climate system, Richard Bradley (US) reported on informal consultations.
SBSTA adopted the draft conclusions and agreed to forward a draft decision to the COP (FCCC/SBSTA/2002/L.19 and Add.1).
enb_long_title: Eighth Conference of the Parties to the UN Framework Convention on Climate Change
